title: SideDrawerItem
description: This is an object representing a navigation item in side drawer

Title.description: A caption label for the item

Image.description: Image to be displayed for the item. Image will display together with Title if specified.

OnPress.description: Action/Rule to be triggered when the item is pressed.

PageToOpen.description: Page to be rendered, references a .page file.

ResetIfPressedWhenActive.description: Flag to determine whether we need to navigate back to the initial page (PageToOpen) when the selected side drawer item is pressed again

Visible.description: A flag to determine if the item is visible

TextAlignment.description: Choose one of the options based on how you want the text alignment on your side drawer item to appear.

SectionItemActive.description: Use this to style menu item which is currently selected.

SectionItemOnPress.description: Use this to style menu item when it is touched upon.

SectionItemInactive.description: Use this to style all the menu items that are not selected.

SectionItemImage.description: The string value is a style class name for image in menu item.
